document.title: Appendix C: Faculty Publication
document.abstract: From the beginning the ILR faculty devoted much of its time and effort to the preparation and publication of works covering a wide range of subject matter within the industrial and labor relations field. Some of the faculty output addressed the interests of their scholarly colleagues and students but much was directed to practitioners and the general public as well.
document.publication-title: The ILR School at Fifty: Voices of the Faculty, Alumni and Friends

field.name: comments
field.value:
Suggested Citation
Gruenfeld Goldberg, E. (Ed). McKersie, R., Miller, J. Gormly, Aronson, R., & Julian, R. (Compilers). The ILR School at Fifty: Voices of the Faculty, Alumni & Friends (pp. 257-261). Ithaca, NY: Cornell University. http://digitalcommons.ilr.cornell.edu/ilratfifty/21/
